name: Ink War
description:
In this strategy game you draw the battles.

Draw triangles for soldiers, lines for roads, and squares for regeneration bases.

Fight the stars, with the goals to destroy the main gray star and to protect your gray dot.

Destroy stars to collect ink, you can only draw when you have enough ink.

Press Enter to turn all the recently drawn lines into roads.

Press the backspace button if you want to start a new game and the space button if you want to switch to full screen or back.

You can change your view with the right arrow key.

Click on the gray dot to start a new match.
